data.title: Love's Labour's Lost - Full Cast & Crew
data.meta_description: Learn more about the full cast of Love's Labour's Lost with news, photos, videos and more at TV Guide
data.text:
35 Metascore

2000

1 hr 33 mins

Drama, Music

PG

Watchlist

Where to Watch

Actor-director Kenneth Branagh updates Shakespeare's romantic comedy in the style of a classic '30s musical in this delightful battle of the sexes. The story centers on a king and his three comrades, who swear an oath to renounce women for three years. But their honor is immediately put to the test when a beautiful French princess (Alicia Silverstone) arrives with three lovely companions. Alessandro Nivola.
